snippet: Despite President Obama’s support for same-sex marriage, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan invited both him and Mitt Romney to speak at a charity event for the New York Archdiocese in October.
abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan leaves policy issues asides, and invites both Pres Obama and Mitt Romney to speak at the Alfred E Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner, a glittering New York Catholic Charity event; Obama's invitation has generated dismay, especially among some opponents of abortion, who point out that there are precedents for barring presidential candidates from the dinner.
lead_paragraph: Despite President Obama’s support for same-sex marriage, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan invited both him and Mitt Romney to speak at a charity event for the New York Archdiocese in October.

headline.seo: Dolan Invites Obama and Romney to Al Smith Dinner
headline.main: Dolan Will Let Obama and Romney Joke It Up at the Al Smith Dinner
headline.print_headline: Dolan Will Let Obama and Romney Joke It Up

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
